description: This is a source file for a front-end component built with Qwik framework. It implements a note-taking interface with CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality, including UI elements like sidebar, toolbar, notes grid, and dialogs.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a timestamp (epoch milliseconds) into a local string representation.

methods.name: uid
methods.description: Generates a short random ID string.
